trans-unit.source: I received the error "This language is already installed. To install an additional language, please install the language pack for that language"
trans-unit.target: I received the error "This language is already installed. To install an additional language, please install the language pack for that language"

trans-unit.source: When attempting to download an additional localized language of Visual Studio you receive the following error "This language is already installed.
trans-unit.target: When attempting to download an additional localized language of Visual Studio you receive the following error "This language is already installed.

trans-unit.source:
To install an additional language, please install the language pack for that language."

Resolution
trans-unit.target:
To install an additional language, please install the language pack for that language."

Resolution

trans-unit.source: When you are choosing the desired localized language make sure that the web page has completely refreshed and has translated into the language you selected.
trans-unit.target: When you are choosing the desired localized language make sure that the web page has completely refreshed and has translated into the language you selected.

trans-unit.source: At that point you can continue the setup process.
trans-unit.target: At that point you can continue the setup process.
